parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To lead astray, deceive, cause to wander. From plane; to roam.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; a separatist, i.e. Exclusively religious; a Pharisean, i.e. Jewish sectary.
